short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to copy the title and URL of the current page for pasting as rich text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a simple "Copy Title and URL" button to the browser that you can use to copy the URL and title of the active tab (page) into Clipboard as markup and rich text so you can paste into any other application.

For example, if you paste to Slack or Notion you'll get the page title linked to the page URL. If you paste to a plain text editor you'll get the markup variant: [title](URL).
